title: Dive
description: This is my chance. A dream come true. I’m going to the Olympic games and I’m determined to win the gold. Nothing is going to stand in my way.That is until my coach tells me of an elaborate plan. Pretend to be dating the gold medal-winning, swimming playboy himself - Noah Adams. It’s publicity for me and kills the rumors about him. It’s a win-win - but is it? My reputation and Olympic chances are on the line, but I’m starting to get distracted by his muscular body, deep voice, and meaningless touches. I jump in with both feet and hope that I remember how to swim because I’m falling for this playboy.
author: Heather Dahlgren
